snippet.title: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex Promotional Trailer
snippet.description:
This is a promotional trailer (called "PROMO6") that appeared on a late pre-release demo disc of Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex. It's a modified version of the two E3 trailers combined, but it also has some more beta content, and is in much higher quality.

I've uploaded it here because of its rarity - I don't think this video has appeared anywhere else on the Internet. I've also disabled ratings, because I didn't actually make this video.

All credit for this video goes to its respective owners. Crash Bandicoot, its characters and assets are properties of Activision Publishing Inc.

Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex developed by Traveller's Tales in 2001 and ported by Eurocom in 2002.

(^ I wrote this after disputing a copyright claim on 2/12/13. When I'd finished, the adverts had already been removed. Holy cow that was fast!)
